page.title: 18SUNDAY
page.content: Normally on Sunday there is no rush to get up, because there is no school, and Dad can have an extra half hour in bed. About 9:00 we have breakfast. Unless we go out for the day we spend the day in the garden, if the weather is nice. Sometimes at dinner time we go to a nearby pub for a drink. In the afternoon my younger brother and I play in the garden, building dens and climbing trees. Sometimes Dad takes us for a walk with the dogs. We often go over to Troway which is a hamlet about 2km away. In the evening Paul and I go in the bath and then watch the T.V. At 9:00 we go to bed.
